title: Prn PT Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City
Interview Descriptions: It was a 2 step process, first short discussion was with recruiter. The actual interview was with hiring managers. Interview took place inside the main office, atmosphere is very calming, friendly environment.
Interview Questions: How available are you to work?

title: PCT/CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City (Tampa, FL) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Went to a hiring event and interview was great. Star method was used. Background screen, urine and tobacco screen. I did two interviews first with two nurses and second was with nurse leader and unit nurse
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time when

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City (Zephyrhills, FL) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Disorganized and confusing. Human Resources and leadership do not communicate with one another.  Lengthy process, job description not accurate.  Constant delays and misinformation.  Never knew where you stood. Didn't get to meet other staff on unit.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time when you had a patient conflict and how you handled it.

title: Administrative/Support Role Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted via email for a phone interview. I responded immediately with my availability, and did not hear anything back. One more follow up email, and still nothing. Over a week later, I  finally get a response stating there was an unavoidable delay, and could we schedule for a specific time and date. I reply in the affirmative, that I will be ready at that date/time, and confirm my phone number. The day before, I email the recruiter to confirm, and do not get a reply. The day of the interview comes, and... nothing. No phone call, completely ghosted. Mind you, there is no number listed in the recruiter's email signature line, so no way for me to reach out to her.  Completely unprofessional.
Interview Questions: None- they did not "show up" to the scheduled interview

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City (Tampa, FL) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: You must fill out a questionaire ahead of time, if they like your answers they will call you for an interview. During the interview the staff of the department get a chance to talk to you and then give input to the hiring process.
Interview Questions: They asked what ortho instrumentation I was familiar with.

title: Lead RMA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City (Dade City, FL) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: It is a long process that you have to wait for HR to communicate with the department. Then the department has to communicate has to get back with HR. After that you go through the screening process.
Interview Questions: What is one of your strength?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City (Dade City, FL)
Interview Descriptions: Be expected to wait at least an hour or more for the Lab director to talk to you. I waited an hour and a half to have them finally talk to me and when they did they didn't appologize for being late.
Interview Questions: Most unexpected question was what my career goals were after my schooling. They were fishing to figure out if I was going to continue my schooling which I didn't see the relevance. They wanted to know if I was like their other people before me who quit before a year was up.

title: Medical Records Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City (Zephyrhills, FL) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions:
Very quick high pressure. Then into a five panel interview.first you speak to Hr dept. Then you recieve a call from practice manager. Then you interview with the hiring  physician. After that return to the hospital for a five panel interview
 Then you wait and see if you have been hired.
Interview Questions:
Where did  you WOR
How much experience?
What was your previous wage?

title: Medical Records Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City (Zephyrhills, FL) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very brief over bartering. Rush in rush to get you hired you are just another body to fill postion. At this time they chose to ask about my personal history references and background then I was referred For a panel interview.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AdventHealth Zephyrhills & Dade City in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: went through staffing agency, then phone interview with agency for placement, next 1 on 1 with unit manger, then HR call with offer
Interview Questions: what cardiac drugs have you had experience with?
